Grains are a type of food that includes wheat, rice, oats, barley, corn, rye, and millet. They are a good source of complex carbohydrates, fiber, B vitamins, and minerals such as iron and magnesium. Whole grains are an important part of a healthy diet.
The grain food group includes foods made from wheat, rice, oats, cornmeal, barley, and other cereal grains. Examples include bread, pasta, oatmeal, breakfast cereals, tortillas, and grits.
